value.title: Chip industry strains to meet AI-fueled demands — will smaller LLMs help?
value.excerpt: Large language models are growing in size, as is the number of companies using generative AI technology. The more the models grow, the more CPUs they consume — exacerbating an already-strained chip supply chain.

value.title: Microsoft technology chief says supply of Nvidia's AI chips is improving
value.excerpt: Kevin Scott, Microsoft's chief technology officer, said supply of Nvidia's graphics processing units is improving now that generative AI hype has cooled a bit.

value.title: Exclusive: Meta executive leading AI chip efforts to leave position
value.excerpt: A Meta Platforms executive overseeing the company's efforts to develop its own chips for artificial intelligence work is leaving her position at the end of the month, according to two sources familiar with the matter.

value.title: Prototype Chips Deliver AI Task Solutions With Minimal Power Consumption
value.excerpt: A chip with 35M memory devices and 34 tiles attains 12.4 TOPS/W (tera-operations per second per watt ), showcasing software-equivalent accuracy for keyword spotting and near-equivalent accuracy for large neural networks across five chips.

value.title: Rebellions' AI chip to undergo IBM quality testing
value.excerpt: Korean AI semiconductor startup Rebellions said Monday that its chips were set to undergo quality testing at data centers of IBM Research's AI Hardware Center in New York. IBM Research's AI Hardware Center conducts exhaustive quality testing for enterprise-grade data center processors.

value.title: Gelsinger: Intel Is Prioritizing AI Sales Enablement For Partners
value.excerpt: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger tells CRN that enabling partners to sell AI products is a priority. Intel executives Christoph Schell and John Kalvin detail how Intel is enabling partners.

value.title: GPUs Transformed AI. Now They’re Here For Quantum.
value.excerpt: While quantum hardware remains immature, companies say they found another way to put complex quantum algorithms to work: running them on the same chips used for powering artificial intelligence.

value.title: AI GPU demand remains strong, says AWS
value.excerpt: AI GPU demand remains strong and the chip shortage has yet to have a significant impact on Amazon Web Services (AWS), according to Robert Wang, managing director of AWS in Taiwan and Hong Kong.

value.title: 3 AI Chip Stocks That Should Be on Every Investor’s Radar This Fall

Pretty much every tech firm and every chipmaker is addressing the opportunity in some form or another. This has led to the rise of AI stocks to buy.
